article_title: Other Key 2016 Battle: Control of the Senate
article_text:
The circuslike presidential race is drawing enormous attention, but another battle in 2016 is almost equally crucial to the political landscape: the fight for control of the Senate, which most analysts consider a tossup.

Republicans now control the chamber 54-46, but far more Republicans than Democrats face re-election, many in swing states....
